mdRecord.dcterms:title: Excavation for the lift elevator shaft before installation of the form, view from west
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lift elevator installed ca.1992 as part of the pavilion renovation to provide handicapped access to the classrooms/conference rooms in the west (1850s) addition to the pavilion. Not in use by 2005; possibly removed. [work]
